name: Save the earth (Xeratas)
description:
PLEASE READ
because i did not have time to develop a good ingame tutorial.

Game instruction:

1. When you start the game, you will be in control of a Blue-hole in space

 2. Moving the mouse will controll the Blue-hole

3. Planets (Earth and Lava-planet) starting falling down your screen

4. The Blue-hole you are controlling has gravity and will suck in near by planets

6. When a planet get's to close to the center of the Blue-hole the planet will be destroyed.

7. The goal of the game is to NOT destroy earth planets and destroy all Lava-Planets

8. You only have 5 earths. That means, once you destroyed 5 Earths you'll lose the game. Your score will be the amount of Lava-Planets you have destroyed.

9. In the bottom left hand side corner youll see 5 bigger Earths which represent your life's left. The number will be reduced when you destroy an Earth. Upper left hand side displays your current Score.

10. Enjoy! Following text is just Info about me

Hi reader!

You just encountered my first ever "completed" project.

The game was developed during the BTPGameJam 

If you find any Bugs or uncompleted or missing features. Please keep in mind, it's my first project and it was developed in a set time frame.
